mapper.select: SELECT file_num AS fileNum , savefilename AS saveFileName , originalfilename AS originalFileName , file_path AS filePath FROM photo_file WHERE file_num = #{fileNum}
SELECT file_num AS fileNum , savefilename , originalfilename , file_path , reg_date FROM photo_file WHERE file_num < #{fileNum} ORDER BY file_num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT file_num AS fileNum , savefilename , originalfilename , file_path , reg_date FROM photo_file WHERE file_num > #{fileNum} ORDER BY file_num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT pf.file_num AS fileNum , pf.savefilename AS saveFileName , pf.originalfilename AS originalFileName , pf.file_path AS filePath , pf.user_seq AS userSeq , pf.user_name AS userName , pf.reg_date AS regDate , u.user_id AS userId FROM photo_file pf JOIN user1 u ON pf.user_seq = u.user_seq ORDER BY pf.reg_date DESC
